name: @padresmurfa/binding
description: Automatic binding strategies to alleviate JavaScript this-pain

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/babel
scripts.build: eslint src/*.js && npm run-script babel && npm run-script minify
scripts.rebuild: npm run-script clean && npm run-script build

author: David Brandt <padresmurfa@gmail.com>
